location.en: JING Bar, The Temple House, Jinjiang District

description.en:
This week, we've invited four bartenders from Taiwan for a limitedâ€‘time guest shift, bringing two nights of diverse and creative cocktail experiences.

Featuring renowned bars like unDer lab, which has been selected for the 50 Best Discovery list, as well as creations by bartender Seven, whose establishments have consistently ranked on Asia's & World's 50 Best Bars lists for multiple years. These four distinctive bars come together at JING Bar, infusing Chengdu nights with inspiration and sophistication.

title.en: Guest Shift by Guangzhou's champion bartender couple in Papuwa

description.en: Papuwa Chengdu proudly presents Guest Shift Night, featuring awardâ€‘winning mixologists from Guangzhou! Join us as champion bartenders 44 from CANTINA AAH and Kaka from IBARUS take over our bar for one special evening. This talented duo will showcase their signature cocktails, blending innovative techniques with a creative mix of ingredients including chili, seafood, grilled elements, exotic spices, and fresh fruits and herbs. Experience their unique personal styles and awardâ€‘winning creations on April 12, 2025, from 9:00 PM to midnight at our Jinjiang District location. Don't miss this extraordinary cocktail journey!

We are honored to welcome Crawford So, the mastermind behind Paal and Gallows Humor, who will craft an intoxicating early spring dreamscape. Paal is known for its minimalist design and innovative cocktail philosophy, while Gallows Humor is famous for its dark humor style and bold cocktail explorations. This is an excellent opportunity to experience two distinctly different beverage systems while exploring the boundless spirit of freedom.

title.en: City Pick Street Pickleball | Tipsy Social

description.en:
Pickleball is taking the world by storm! Mo Noches Bar teams up with @Pang Chengdu Pickleball ClubğŸ¾ to turn the street into a court and the bar into a courtside lounge.

Grab a paddle, break a sweat, then cool down with a handcrafted cocktail on April 18, 2025, from 7:00Â PM to 10:00Â PM. Move, play, and sip your way through a lively night in Jinjiang District!

title.en: Master Class & Guest Shift | Simone Caporale

description.en: SIP invited Simone Caporale, who has been ranked as one of the World's 50 Best Bars for four consecutive years (2012â€‘2015), to come to Chengdu to share his 'Cuban Wisdom' cocktail concept.
